page.title: 13CROFTING
page.content:
Originally the term{"Crofter"}was given to tenants who lived in houses and worked small areas of land which belonged to the lairds or land owners. Today crofters are thought of as farmers with a small acreage of land and a few animals who do not sell their produce. In this area there are 5 small crofts. {Name of croft Acres Crops Livestock Hyndgreenie 20 Hay 16 Cattle
Whistle Brae 33 Hay 13 Cattle
